This recipe is my favorite one - optimized for flavor rather than alcohol content (it still kicks in). üçΩÔ∏è Servings:1-4 Ingredients for 1 liter of Gl√ºhwein 300 ml Cassis-Juice (Johannesbeer), if you can’t find it you can replace it with another juice, I did it e.g. with cranberry pomegranate juice 1 bottle 700ml red wine (I prefer Primitivo/Zinfandel), don’t buy a cheap cooking wine, you want to drink it :) 50 g Sugar 25 g Raisins 1 orange 1 cinamon bark 1 spoon ginger powder (or a bit of fresh ginger) 1 spoon cloves 5 star anise if you don’t have the spices you can also just throw in sweet cinamon tea bags instead (or similar), they contain most spices - I took 6 teabags for 1 litre Directions cut the orange in nice looking pieces (since they are mainly decoration) throw everything in a pot warm up (don’t boil) enjoy Contributors Bernhard Egger – website, twitter
